ethnologue_comment.comment:
E16/E17/E18/E19/E20/E21/E22/E23/E24/E25/E26 has two entries
| p{4.5cm}} | Mapidian [mpw] | Mawayana [mzx] |
| Alternate names | Mahuayana, Maiopitian, Maopityan, Mawayana | Mahuayana |
| Population | 50 in Brazil (1986 Howard) | 50 (1986 C. Howard) |


Not surprisingly, the two entries refer to the same group
(**hh:hewsoc:Howard:Waiwai**), as comparison of data from both ethnonyms confirms
(**hh:hew:Farabee:CArawaks**, **hh:hv:Carlin:Cariban-Mawayana**). See also: Mapidian-Mawayana [mpw].
